com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers

Class GlobalConstant

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.GlobalConstant

  • public final class GlobalConstant
extends java.lang.Object
    GlobalConstant is a class that hold all the global constants that we use in all the application This constants should be public upon all the other classes in our application. This constants could be replaced with local final variables, we decide to put them in one class for convenience and the accessibly.
